data.title: Visa Unveils FinTech Partnership Program In Europe
data.text: Visa is rolling out a new initiative aimed at connecting European financial institutions and merchants with cutting-edge digital payments services. Fintech Partner Connect will “support new ways for businesses and consumers to seamlessly and securely pay, get paid, send money and more,” a spokesperson for the credit card and financial services giant said in an […]

data.title: Visa CEO Alfred Kelly on how coronavirus has affected the industry
data.text: Alfred Kelly, CEO of Visa, joins CNBC's Evolve Summit to discuss how the business has pivoted in the age of coronavirus.

data.title: Who Needs 'Cards' To Make Payments
data.text: The Justice Department has filed a lawsuit against Visa, Inc., in Visa's acquisition of Plaid, a data network company, and shows how out-of-date regulation can be.
